name: Ball Rush (AS DEV)
description:
Ball Rush is a 2d endless game created by ASDEV.This game is currently in early access but its almost completed.So you can play it.

Just get your "Space" key or "Mouse" Ready and you're good to play this game!

Tha task of the game is "Race to infinity",mean just go more and more and try to beat your own high score....!!!

You can watch behind the game on my yt channel:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOaSVvD3Y3ZxULW6nBNIwqA

That's it!Hurry up and download the game!

Thanks!
